description: This file defines React components for the dashboard layout of a video builder application, including Sidebar, Topbar, and DashboardShell components.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: A React functional component rendering a sidebar with navigation items and tips.

methods.name: Topbar
methods.description: A React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with a title and optional right-side content.

methods.name: DashboardShell
methods.description: A React functional component providing the overall layout integrating sidebar, topbar, main content, and optional right panel.
